name: MagicCube v0.1a
description:
Welcome to Magic Cube!
Explore this little world and gain insight and understanding to spells and control over the four elements; Earth, Fire, Water and Air!
Begin your training here and get to the end of the magic trial to become an official Magician!

Use WASD or the directional keys to move around.
Hit space to use the spells and to switch between spells, use mouse scroll.

Sagar Shrestha - Programming
Martim Grosner - Programming
Justin Neumann - Artwork
Holly Lowe - Level Design / Sound
